Name: Justin Xiang
Details: Justin Xiang was formerly Justin Allard, and he was a former officer of the Federated Suns Armed Forces who was discharged under dishonorable circumstances and choose instead to embrace his mother's Capellan heritage. Xiang then became the current Solarius VII Championship while denouncing House Davion's injustice and dedicating his arena victories to Maximillian Liao.
